Summary: Either two separate orange colored objects flew over my house, or one with a 2nd fly bye
divs: Sighting DetailsOn July 4th at approximately 9:45, I walked out into my yard. I didn't do this to watch fireworks, I did this because oddly, my neighbor had someone cutting his grass in the dark. I walked outside to see what that was all about. When I looked across the street, I noticed an orange ball of light traveling at a brisk speed. I could see it approaching through the trees. I got my phone out (Iphone) and started to record it. (I HAVE VIDEO) When it made it into a clearing, I shot video and took some still photos. It flew over my house, and it appeared to be ascending after it past over. A few seconds after I lost visual, a second light, this time white'ish in color at an extremely rapid speed flew in the same direction as the first object. About 5 minutes later, a SECOND object looking exactly like the first one flew over again. I have video and still photos of it as well. There was no sound, no blinking lights, nothing.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Brandon
There were no other sightings in Brandon on or around July 4th 2013
